rows.label: qst702701_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, are you Drivers?
Then you've come just in time!

rows.label: qst702701_msg0002
rows.name:
You passed that bridge coming here,
right? I was headed for the Haradd
Hills that lie beyond, but then...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, then some monsters came and
settled there and now I've got
a problem.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0004
rows.name: Please, would you defeat them for me?

rows.label: qst702701_msg0005
rows.name:
The dunes are the only place where
you can find sand of that color
and composition...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0006
rows.name:
If I don't make the delivery in time,
my father will surely get physical...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0007
rows.name:
...Ugh, the less said of that the better.
I hope you deal with them soon! I'll be
waiting at the Felt Village campsite.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0102
rows.name: Are we gonna do anything about it?

rows.label: qst702701_msg0103
rows.name:
Personally, I do feel that ensuring
Laura's happy reunion with her mother
is our top priority, of course..

rows.label: qst702701_msg0104
rows.name:
But abandoning a person in need
doesn't quite sit well with me either...

rows.label: qst702701_msg0105
rows.name:
If we extend a helping hand,
we may receive assistance in return
somewhere down the line.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0109
rows.name:
Yeah.
We're with you, whatever you decide.

rows.label: qst702701_msg0110
rows.name:
Thanks, guys.
Let me think a while.
